Message: The user completes the submission of the form
The brand name in your ad doesn’t align with the product you are advertising. Please update this to an accurate, legally licensed name and resubmit.

It looks like your ad was rejected because the brand name used doesn't align with the product being advertised. Please update the ad to use an accurate, legally licensed name and resubmit it for approval. For more details on our ad policy, you can check out this article: [Ad Policy](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/25362604231053-Ad-Policy). If you have any further questions, feel free to ask!
What do I have to update?

You need to update the brand name in your ad to ensure it accurately represents the product you are advertising. Make sure the brand name is legally licensed and matches the product details. Once you've made this update, resubmit your ad for approval. If you need more guidance, you can refer to this article: [My ad got rejected. What's next?](https://help.newsbreak.com/hc/en-us/articles/18085960681101-My-ad-got-rejected-What-s-next).
